name: 0Intro
_source: speak;;Had I the heavens' embroidered cloths/Enwrought with golden and silver light,;top_left;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Even for colour TVs, there are many different colours,;center;;clear;;;text-yellow;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Johanna drove slowly into the city/The Hudson river all filled with snow;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-blue;hold;no_sound;no_block

speak;;'Oh! We poets always have our pockets full of love letters, written to so many imaginary beauties. Now, you can take this one and make the words ring true. Take this fictional letter, meant for no particular lady, and put it to real use. Take all my insincere romantic lines and give them a direction. Make it so these haphazard verses will come together and surround her like love birds coming home to nest!';center;;clear;20;;text-orange;;8;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;The blue and the dim and the dark cloths/Of night and light and the half-light,;top_left;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;what kind of colour is now? Today's weather will be nice on the canvas. Even an absurd response is sensible for someone from Jupiter.;center;;clear;;;text-yellow;;4;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;She spied the ring on His Honor's finger;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-blue;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;I would spread the cloths under your feet:/But I, being poor, have only my dreams;top_left;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block

speak;;Death is personified as an anthropomorphic figure or fictional character from the debut of mankind.The cruel angel's thesis will soon take flight through the window.;center;;clear;;;text-yellow;;4;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;And the stone walls of Harmony Hall bear witness;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-green;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;I have spread my dreams under your feet.;top_left;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;A piano sends its melody to the field of dreams all over the world. ma-mi-mu-me-mo. The fluffy temptation of wheat.;center;;clear;;;text-yellow;;4;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Anybody with a worried mind could never forgive the sight;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-green;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Tread softly because you tread on my dreams;top_left;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;The bats are in the belfry, the dew is on the moor;center;;clear;;;text-yellow;;;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Of wicked snakes inside a place you thought was dignified;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-green;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;And I wonder, should I offer you a chair?;top_right;;clear;;;text-brown;;;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;And the whole wide world is on your case;left;;clear;;;text-purple;;;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;I could wait a year, but I shouldn't wait three;bottom_left;;clear;;;text-light-red;;;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;I do believe it, I do believe it's true;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-corn-yellow;;;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Turning and turning in the widening gyre;top_left;;clear;;;text-light-green;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Things fall apart, the centre cannot hold;bottom;;clear;;;text-light-green;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Take it easy for the rest of the day! The monkeys stand for honesty;top;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Avoid eating and drinking for the next two hours, especially if you are still numb. Giraffes are insincere.;center;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Avoid HOT fluids, alcohol, and hard or chewy foods. Choose cool and soft foods today and tomorrow.;top;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;The soft diet should continue until we see again. The elephants are kindly, but they're dumb.;center;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;When you get home, apply an ice pack contained within a flannel on the face over the treated area.;top;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block

speak;;Bleeding is rarely a major issue after surgery. Slight oozing of blood from the surgical site may be ignored. Orangutans are sceptical of changes in their cages.;center;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;If bleeding that concers you occurs, apply gentle pressure to the site for a full ten minutes.;top;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Don't be tempted to stretch your lip or check our handiwork. The zoo-keeper is very fond of rum.;center;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Add one teaspoon of salt to a tumbler of HOT water. Take a mouthful at a time.;top;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Let it bathe the operation site until it cools, then repeat. Zebras are reactionaries, antelopes are missionaries.;center;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Pigeons plot in secrecy. The next appointment is to remove the stitches.;top;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;It will only take a few minutes and should not be uncomfortable. Hamsters turn on frequently.;center;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;It is important that we review the success of the procedure in the future. At the zoo.;top;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;We shall contact you at the appropriate time to arrange this appointment. At the zoo.;center;;clear;;;text-blue;;3;hold;no_sound;no_block

speak;;'But the usher has seized my arm, and is dragging me away, and as he does so, he says: ''What are you doing? Don't you know that you can't do whatever you want to do? Why should a young man like you, with your whole life before you, get hysterical like this? Why don't you think of what you're doing? You can't act like this even if other people aren't around! You will be sorry if you do not do what you should do, you can't carry on like this, it is not right, you will find that out soon enough, everything you do matters too much,'' and he said that dragging me through the lobby of the theatre into the cold light, and I woke up into the bleak winter morning of my 21st birthday, the windowsill shining with its lip of snow, and the morning already begun.';top_left;;clear;7;;text-blue;;9;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Will nature make a man of me yet?;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;I'd ask him what the matter was;center;;clear;;;text-yellow;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;When in this charming car/This charming man;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;But I know that he don't talk;center;;clear;;;text-yellow;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Why pamper life's complexity/When the leather runs smooth on the passenger seat?;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;I would go out tonight, but I haven't got a stitch to wear;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;This man said, "It's gruesome that someone so handsome should care";bottom_right;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Ah, a jumped-up pantry boy/Who never knew his place;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Oh, mama, can this really be the end?;center;;clear;;;text-yellow;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;He knows so much about these things;bottom_right;;clear;;;text-red;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;Hey, the days are wonderful, in the midst of weakness and anxiety;center;;clear;5;;text-white;hold;no_sound;no_block
speak;;...in full tailor-made suits, arriving to...;right;120;thought_bubble;no_block
speak;;...the point I was trying to make earlier...;left;120;thought_bubble;no_block
speak;;...tries to complicate our relationship,{w} but there's a ten-year gap...;right;120;thought_bubble;no_block
speak;;...between how he acts then and now, he must be putting up...;top_right;120;thought_bubble;no_block
speak;;... a facade against the unspoken accusation...;bottom_left;120;thought_bubble;no_block
speak;;...that they were kidding themselves,{w} but they always were making one...;bottom_right;120;thought_bubble;no_block
speak;Claude;...Excuse me,{w} is this seat taken?;no_sound
speak;Claude;What's going on,{w} Father?{w}{clear}Some sort of wedding?;no_sound
speak;Celine;Something of the sort.{w}{clear}We're waiting for the groom to arrive.;no_sound
speak;Celine;Aren't the names on the invitation?;no_sound
speak;Celine;It's between that Milieu fellow,{w} and...{w} her name escapes me.;no_sound
speak;Celine;Don't criticise me.{w}{clear}Do you have the rings?;no_sound
speak;Celine;Surely you haven't forgotten the rings?;no_sound
speak;Celine;Come on, Claude.{w}{clear}Wedding's about to start.{w}{clear}Where's the rings?;no_sound
speak;Claude;Where there even any rings to begin with?;no_sound
speak;Celine;Of course there were rings, Claude,{w} it's a wedding!;no_sound
speak;Celine;Come on Claude,{w} this is just sheer laziness at this stage.{w}{clear}Remember!;no_sound
speak;Claude;How can I remember?|What did I forget?;no_sound
speak;Celine;You can remember,{w} because obviously,{w} you've forgotten!{w}{clear}Come on Claude,{w} think!{w}{clear}Think, Claude!;no_sound
speak;;I told you a thousand times to separate the clothes!
speak;;You didn't do it on purpose, did you?
speak;;These are the sorts of mistakes worthy of putting you up for adoption.
speak;;Would be quite cruel to do so.

speak;;Yes, I am very cruel,{w} a very evil mother.{w}{clear}So evil that I do all the work around the house.{w}{clear}So cruel as to raise you all by myself.{w}{clear}Porridge is about ready.{w}{clear}Serve it out, Claudia.
speak;;And wake up Claude,{w} he's still sleeping.
speak;;It'll be the next ice age by the time he wakes up by himself.{w}{clear}Go wake him up, please.
speak;;Been shopping around for replacement daughters recently.
speak;;Would be quite mean to replace me.
speak;;We're all replaceable in this world, Claudia.
speak;;Some are more replaceable than others.
speak;;I'm going out to the well now, Claudia.
speak;;The handle of the pot can get quite hot while it's boiling,{w} so make sure you wear gloves.
speak;;Okay,{w} I'm going out now,{w} alright?
speak;Claudia;Claude.{w}{clear}I've killed a man.{w}{clear}Do you've space to hide the body?
speak;Claude;You'd be a good candidate for crucifixion.
speak;Claudia;I've heard recently that adopting children has become rather in vogue lately, Claude.
speak;Claude;In vogue as well to say in vogue instead of in fashion?
speak;Claudia;Quite in vogue to say in vogue.
speak;Claude;Also in vogue to imply that I'm a good candidate for adoption?
speak;Claudia;That's rather quite entirely in your head, Claude.{w}{clear}I'm not implying anything.{w}{clear}If I wanted you to be put in an orphanage,{w} I'd say so outright.
speak;Claudia;Personally, I would sell you to a slave driver.
speak;Claude;Don't know if can say good morning now with the proper amount of sincerity.
speak;Claudia;Nevermind good morning.{w}{clear}You never say anything nice to me,{w} sincerely or otherwise.
speak;Claudia;You think you're clever but you're really not.
speak;Claude;Not in vogue to be clever, Claudia.{w}{clear}Clever people don't get anywhere in life.
speak;Claudia;Seeing how well mother treats you,{w} I'm inclined to agree.
speak;Claudia;Porridge's ready on the table.{w}{clear}Come on, get up.
speak;Claudia;By the way Claude,{w} your cloak's pink.
speak;Claude;Think I heard something along those lines.
speak;Claudia;I mixed the clothes together while washing.
speak;Claudia;I wanted to see what would happen.
speak;Claudia;This sort of spinelessness is exactly why you still don't have a girlfriend.
speak;Claudia;Planning to become a priest when you grow up?{w}{clear}Shave your head, maybe?
speak;Claude;Those in glass houses shouldn't throw stones.
speak;Claude;Making up people who aren't real...{w}{clear}Isn't that schizophrenia?
speak;Claudia;Whatever forever.{w}{clear}Had no choice.{w}{clear}We live in the middle of nowhere.{w}{clear}There's no one to meet.
speak;Claudia;I'd sooner die than have you.
# Claude is outside, walking to the well. Claudia too.
# Both run to their starting positions
speak;Claude;Thinking about it,{w} we wouldn't stand a chance against orphans.
speak;Claude;They're way hungrier to succeed than we are.
speak;Claude;We should probably be nicer to mother.
speak;Claude;We should grow up to be people of value, Claudia.{w}{clear}To avoid being eaten by orphans.
speak;Claudia;A person of value like mother?
speak;Ian;Lying is wrong.{w}{clear}I wouldn't want to lie now,{w} would I?
speak;Ian;Two wrongs don't make a right.
speak;Anemone;I'll catch up with you in Wolfstock.
# Ian with the cultists leave into the forest
